mapper.select: SELECT fc.feed_comment_id, fc.comment , u.user_id AS writerUserId, u.uid AS writerUid , u.nick_name AS writerNickName, u.pic AS writerPic FROM feed_comment fc INNER JOIN user u ON u.user_id = fc.user_id WHERE fc.feed_id = #{feedId} ORDER BY fc.feed_comment_id LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{sizePlusOne}
